sharpRISK aims transforming risk management in the manufacturing industry. 
A demo version can be tested at the demo site:

[https://red-datafactory.shinyapps.io/sharprisk/](https://red-datafactory.shinyapps.io/sharprisk/)  

sharpRISK combines well established risk identification and mitigation approaches with new natural language processing capabilities.
